text: is a Japanese television jidaigeki or period drama that was broadcast in 1984. It is the 22nd in the Hissatsu series. ==Cast== * Machiko Kyō as Okuni * Akira Onodera as Shinkichi * Midori Nishizaki * Gannosuke Ashiya as Kanppie * Etsushi Takahashi *Kiyoshi Nakajō as Yuji ==References== Category:1984 Japanese television series debuts Category:1980s drama television series Category:Jidaigeki television series
title: Hissatsu Shikirinin
